title: Upper Body Workout
description: Resistance training, also known as strength training, is an essential component of any fitness routine, especially for your upper body.

exercisesList.title: Cobra Stretch
exercisesList.description: A gentle backbend that stretches the spine, chest, and shoulders.
exercisesList.technique: Lie on your stomach, place your hands under your shoulders, and slowly lift your chest off the ground.

exercisesList.title: Plank Ups
exercisesList.description: An exercise that targets the core, shoulders, and arms.
exercisesList.technique: Start in a forearm plank position, press up to a high plank, and then return to the forearm plank.

exercisesList.title: Rest
exercisesList.description: A short break to catch your breath.
exercisesList.technique: Relax and prepare for the next exercise.

exercisesList.title: Double Heel Tabs
exercisesList.description: An exercise to strengthen the lower body and improve balance.
exercisesList.technique: Stand with feet hip-width apart, lift your heels, and tap them together.

exercisesList.title: Lung Jumps Alternated
exercisesList.description: A plyometric exercise that targets the legs and glutes.
exercisesList.technique: Start in a lunge position, jump up, and switch legs mid-air.

exercisesList.title: Squat jump
exercisesList.description: A high-intensity exercise that works the legs and core.
exercisesList.technique: Start in a squat position, jump up explosively, and land softly back into a squat.

exercisesList.title: Rest
exercisesList.description: A short break to catch your breath.
exercisesList.technique: Relax and prepare for the next exercise.

exercisesList.title: Boxer Shuffle
exercisesList.description: An exercise to strengthen the lower body and improve balance.
exercisesList.technique: Stand with feet hip-width apart, lift your heels, and tap them together.

exercisesList.title: Plank Reaches
exercisesList.description: A plyometric exercise that targets the legs and glutes.
exercisesList.technique: Start in a lunge position, jump up, and switch legs mid-air.

exercisesList.title: Rest
exercisesList.description: A short break to catch your breath.
exercisesList.technique: Relax and prepare for the next exercise.
